balanced_loadout.name: Balanced Loadout
balanced_loadout.description: Your Gear’s Weight Capacity is increased by +2.

staving_off_the_deep.name: Staving off the Deep
staving_off_the_deep.description: Gain +2 to your Marbles stat up to a maximum of 6. Clear all of your Backlash.

tinkerer.name: Tinkerer
tinkerer.description: When you take this Development you immediately Unlock 4 Locked Hardpoints on your Gear.

anatomical_precision.name: Anatomical Precision
anatomical_precision.description: 1/turn when you damage a Fish you may force them to re-roll the Kill Check.

defensive_posture.name: Defensive Posture
defensive_posture.description: Once between the end of your turn and the start of your next turn, when you receive damage, you may roll 1d6. On a 4+ you choose which section of your Gear takes the damage, even if the attack is a critical hit. The Column is still determined normally.

reeler.name: Reeler
reeler.description: Your first Reel action each turn costs 0 AP.

expert_pilot.name: Expert Pilot
expert_pilot.description: Once per Encounter you may gain +1 AP for a single turn.

three_is_a_crowd.name: Three is a Crowd
three_is_a_crowd.description: You may install up to two Internals with the AI Copilot Tag on your Gear instead of one. (They can’t be the same one.) Additionally you may install those Internals in your Chest section.

a_brush_with_the_deep.name: A Brush with the Deep
a_brush_with_the_deep.description: This Development can be taken multiple times. You learn a Deep-Word from the Deep-Tongue list.

marksman.name: Marksman
marksman.description: Your FAR attacks ignore Soft and Hard Cover.

hook_artist.name: Hook Artist
hook_artist.description: 1/turn after you hit with a CLOSE attack you may apply Hooked 1 to the target.

get_it_together.name: Get It Together
get_it_together.description: Whenever you lose your Marbles and roll on the Affliction Table you may adjust the result by 1 in either direction.

procure_new_fishing_gear.name: Procure New Fishing Gear
procure_new_fishing_gear.description: You discard your old Fishing Gear. Choose a new Gear. Unlock Hardpoints on it equal to the number of extra Hardpoints unlocked on your previous Gear. (via Level Up or other effects) You do not need to Maintain your Fishing Gear this Shoreleave.

hardy_physique_or_prosthetics.name: Heavy Physique or Prosthetics
hardy_physique_or_prosthetics.description: You ignore all results from the “Gear Destruction” table except “Killed in Action” going forward. If your Fisher is suffering any persistent effects from the table already, they are cleared.

redundant_construction.name: Redundant Construction
redundant_construction.description: Choose one of your non-weapon, non-mitigation Internals, it gains the Sturdy tag. You may change which Internal gains this benefit each time you Maintain your Fishing Gear during Shore Leave.

salvaged_parts.name: Salvaged Parts
salvaged_parts.description: When you take this Development you may choose one Internal from the Fish Type Internals. You may install that Internal on your Gear for the rest of your career. Its weight increases by 2. You may install it on any Section except Legs. (The GM may make them hunt for it during the next fishing trip or otherwise procure it narratively without combat.) You must stick with the chosen Internal for the rest of your career.

scout.name: Scout
scout.description: 1/turn you may Scan as a 0AP Action.

intense_training.name: Intense Training
intense_training.description: Gain +2 to any of your Shore Leave stats.

running_ragged.name: Running Ragged
running_ragged.description: When performing the “Maintain Fishing Gear” Downtime Action you may repair any number of Fishing Gear, rolling a separate check for each. You gain +1 Backlash for each Fishing Gear beyond the first. If you Act Out the Downtime it only affects the Maintenance of a single Fishing Gear.

lightning_reflexes.name: Lightning Reflexes
lightning_reflexes.description: You treat your Weight Class as 1 lighter (Up to Ultra Light) during the first Round of combat.

planner.name: Planner
planner.description: You gain +1 DTA each Shore Leave.
